alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Jackson; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 11:24PM CDT until June 10 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... East central Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1124 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Retrop to 4 miles west of Mangum, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Hobart, Mangum, Cordell, Granite, Sentinel, Blair, Dill City, Lone Wolf, Roosevelt, Gotebo, Martha, Rocky, Willow, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Retrop, Cloud Chief, Warren and Humphreys. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
